An interactive, variable-dividend rate contract with an ICO-capped price floor and collectibles.
Discord:   https://discord.gg/gDtTX62*
attributes.name: Fortis

attributes.documentation:
Same as buy, but explicitly sets your dividend percentage.
If this has been called before, it will update your `default' dividend
  percentage for regular buy transactions going forward.
attributes.name: buyAndSetDivPercentage

attributes.documentation:
Transfer tokens from the caller to a new holder.
No charge incurred for the transfer. We'd make a terrible bank.
attributes.name: transfer

attributes.documentation:
Transfer tokens from the caller to a new holder: the Used By Smart Contracts edition.
No charge incurred for the transfer. No seriously, we'd make a terrible bank.
attributes.name: transferFrom

attributes.documentation: Retrieves your currently selected dividend rate.
attributes.name: getMyDividendRate

attributes.documentation: Retrieve the total frontend token supply
attributes.name: getFrontEndTokenSupply

attributes.documentation: Retreive the total dividend token supply
attributes.name: getDividendTokenSupply

attributes.documentation: Retrieve the frontend tokens owned by the caller
attributes.name: myFrontEndTokens

attributes.documentation: Retrieve the dividend tokens owned by the caller
attributes.name: myDividendTokens
